long_description:
This mod add more variants of tools screwdriver and shears (if [vines](https://content.minetest.net/packages/VanessaE/plantlife_modpack/) mod is enabled).
It provides new tool garden trowel (used with [composting](https://content.minetest.net/packages/SFENCE/composting/) mod).
name: moretools
short_description: Add more variant of screwdriver and shears (if vines is enabled).  Add garden trowel tool if composting is enabled.
title: More Tools
